DOC.brief_summary: The focus randomize clinical trial study examination effect maintain energy balance different energy flux . It address primary question : Are increase health benefit relate body composition metabolic function associate maintain energy balance high energy flux compare low energy flux ?
DOC.detailed_description: We randomly assign 75 sedentary healthy individual one two exercise group non-exercise group . We follow individual 6 month intervention period . Both group maintain weight match energy intake expenditure ( thus exercise group consume calorie ) .
DOC.criteria: BMI < 35 2145 year age Fasting plasma glucose < 126 mg/dl Current medication must prescribe 3 month stable Internet access Able participate somewhat strenuous physical exercise program Able provide inform consent participation research study Currently participate weight loss exercise intervention / program Planning weight loss surgery Weight change > 5 lb last 12 month Currently take follow : hormone replacement therapy , beta blocker , allergy shot systematic corticosteroid ( except inhaler ) Significant cardiovascular disease disorder include limited : serious arrhythmia , cardiomyopathy , congestive heart failure , stroke transient ischemic cerebral attack , peripheral vascular disease intermittent claudication , acute , chronic recurrent thrombophlebitis , Stage II Stage III hypertension , myocardial infarction abnormal exercise stress test . Medical history presence significant condition disease may interfere study , recent surgery Pregnant actively try become pregnant Gave birth last 12 month < 6 month postlactation > 90th percentile Brief Symptom Inventory [ BSI ] Planning move area next 8 month Other medical , psychiatric behavioral factor judgment principal investigator may interfere study participation ability ot follow intervention protocol .
